tutorial.speak:
Let's connect your lessons to the B1 dot church mobile app. First, download the B1 Church app from the Google Play Store or Apple App Store. It's completely free.
Open the app and you'll see the Church Search screen. You can search by church name, city, or zip code.
Type your church name in the search field.
Select your church from the search results.
You'll land on the home screen. Tap the menu icon in the top left corner.
From the side menu, tap the Login button at the bottom.
This opens the login screen where you can sign in with your account.
Enter the same email and password you used to register on Lessons dot church, then tap Sign In.
Once logged in, you'll see the home screen with your Lessons card. Tap on Lessons to view your scheduled lessons.
You'll see your classrooms and scheduled lessons. Tap on a lesson to open it.
Now you can see the full lesson content with all the sections. Notice the tabs at the top. You can tap any section tab to jump directly to that part of the lesson. This makes it super easy for volunteers to navigate between sections during class.
